kb_docs.title: Return Policy
kb_docs.content: You can return items within 30 days.

metadata.prompt:
You are a helpful customer service assistant. Use the provided knowledge base documents to answer the user's questions. If the user asks for an order lookup or to send an invoice, use the available tools.

--- Knowledge Base ---
### Return Policy
You can return items within 30 days.

### Shipping Info
Orders ship within 2 business days.


--- User Message ---

metadata.error: Error code: 429 - {'error': {'message': 'You exceeded your current quota, please check your plan and billing details. For more information on this error, read the docs: https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/error-codes/api-errors.', 'type': 'insufficient_quota', 'param': None, 'code': 'insufficient_quota'}}
